name: Senses Fail
description: '''Senses Fail''' is an American [[post-hardcore]] band formed in [[Ridgewood, New Jersey]], in 2001. Founded by vocalist Buddy Nielsen, drummer Dan Trapp, guitarists Garrett Zablocki and Dave Miller, and bassist James Gill (replaced by Mike Glita shortly after); the band has seen many lineup changes, with Nielsen being the only consistent member. The band has released eight studio albums, one live album, and several [[extended play|EP]]s.
